blogPost.excerpt: I want to request integration X is a common question we all get from customers as makers. The Voting Portal enables users and leads to request their favorite integrations. Try the free plan or get a 20% discount for the first 6 months on the paid plans.
blogPost.body: I want to request integration X is a common question we all get from customers as makers. The Voting Portal enables users and leads to request their favorite integrations. Try the free plan or get a 20% discount for the first 6 months on the paid plans.
blogPost.title: Voting Portal - Track integration requests and streamline your roadmap
blogPost.author: Jake Prins

localize.description: 我想请求集成X是我们作为制造商从客户那里得到的一个常见问题。投票门户使用户和潜在客户能够请求他们喜欢的集成。试用免费计划或在付费计划的前6个月获得20%的折扣。
localize.tagline: 跟踪集成请求并简化您的路线图

localize.description: 我想請求集成X是我們作爲製造商從客戶那裏得到的一個常見問題。投票門戶使用戶和潛在客戶能夠請求他們喜歡的集成。試用免費計劃或在付費計劃的前6個月獲得20%的折扣。
localize.tagline: 跟蹤集成請求並簡化您的路線圖

previous.excerpt: SEO isn't always easy, but this dashboard makes it easier simple. Plan, manage and scale your SEO in a powerful, all in one. Includes writing & research tools as well as over 2000 resources to turn your SEO efforts into gold 📈
previous.title: SEO Operating System - All-in-one Notion dashboard to scale and manage your SEO

localize.description: 搜索引擎优化并不总是容易的，但这个仪表板让它更容易简单。计划，管理和扩展您的SEO在一个强大的，所有在一个。包括写作和研究工具，以及超过2000个资源，把你的SEO努力变成黄金📈。
localize.tagline: 一体化的Notion仪表盘来扩展和管理您的SEO。

localize.description: 搜索引擎優化並不總是容易的，但這個儀表板讓它更容易簡單。計劃，管理和擴展您的SEO在一個強大的，所有在一個。包括寫作和研究工具，以及超過2000個資源，把你的SEO努力變成黃金📈。
localize.tagline: 一體化的Notion儀表盤來擴展和管理您的SEO。

next.excerpt: Clubhouse is awesome for "I'm here, who can I listen to?", but not yet so awesome for scheduling future events and ensuring you don't miss your favorite mod. ====== YoYo helps moderators take their audience from 1 room to the next!
next.title: YoYo - Accelerate and own your Clubhouse audience

localize.description: Clubhouse对于 "我在这里，我可以听谁说话？"来说是很棒的，但对于安排未来的活动和确保你不会错过你最喜欢的版主来说，还不是那么棒。====== YoYo帮助版主将他们的听众从1个房间带到下一个房间。
localize.tagline: 加速发展并拥有您的会所观众

localize.description: Clubhouse對於 "我在這裏，我可以聽誰說話？"來說是很棒的，但對於安排未來的活動和確保你不會錯過你最喜歡的版主來說，還不是那麼棒。====== YoYo幫助版主將他們的聽衆從1個房間帶到下一個房間。
localize.tagline: 加速發展並擁有您的會所觀衆
